name: Message
description: A string of data that is meant to be processed.

properties.description: A unique, API-generated identifier for this resource.
The data that is meant to be processed.
The amount of time a single reservation lasts for this message by default. This can be overwritten on a per-request basis.
The number of seconds to delay putting a message on the queue. The message will not be available until this time has elapsed.
The number of seconds to keep a message on the queue before it is automatically deleted.

interactions.description: Remove a message from the queue.
Retrieve messages from the queue without reserving them.

params.description: The maximum number of messages to return.

interactions.description: Add messages to the end of the queue.
